metadata.title: HD Active Frame Sports Wrap Sunglasses (Shiny Black)
features: 30 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE AND 90 DAY LIMITED WARRANTY AGAINST MANUFACTURER DEFECTS: Our main goal is make our customers happy and provide the best shopping experience; If you are not completely satisfied with our product or your purchase please contact us, we'll be happy to help
description: Modified rectangular sports wrap with HD lenses that enhances color, clarity, and reduces glare. Give yourself a high-definition view of the world while protecting your eyes from the sun with HD sunglasses. Made with polycarbonate based frame, pin hinges, and HD polycarbonate UV protected lenses. Lens Height:40mm Lens Width:65mm Bridge:18mm Frame Total:155mm
